summary: Weekly Lease Calculation Bug Fixes - All 4 bug fixes verified. Print view now shows weekly Avant taxes/TPS/TVQ amounts instead of monthly. Print view has 'Retour au calculateur' back button. 'Meilleur choix location' section shows correct HEBDO label and weekly values. Analysis grid title shows 'Paiements hebdo' with weekly amounts.
critical_code_review_comments: Bug Fix 1 (Print view weekly lease): Lines 1436-1437 correctly calculate weekly Avant taxes, TPS, TVQ using paymentFrequency === 'weekly' ? value * 12/52 : ...
Bug Fix 2 (Back button): Lines 1280-1301 add .back-btn CSS class with display:block and @media print { .no-print { display: none !important } }. Line 1481 adds button with back-btn no-print classes
Bug Fix 3 (Best lease section): Lines 3136-3151 correctly convert bestLeaseOption values to weekly: paymentFrequency === 'weekly' ? bestLeaseOption.monthly * 12/52 : ...
Bug Fix 4 (Analysis grid): Line 3043 changes title to 'Paiements hebdo'. Lines 3073-3078 convert grid values to weekly: paymentFrequency === 'weekly' ? stdRow.monthly * 12/52 : ...
context_for_next_testing_agent: Weekly lease calculation bug fixes fully tested. All 4 fixes working: 1) Print view Avant taxes/TPS/TVQ show weekly amounts (170.96$, 8.55$, 17.05$), 2) Print view has 'Retour au calculateur' back button visible on screen but hidden when printing, 3) 'Meilleur choix location' shows HEBDO label and weekly payments (168.20$/sem), 4) Analysis grid shows 'Paiements hebdo' title with weekly values (~176-197$). Login via JavaScript password setter works to avoid special character issue.

bug_fix_1_print_view_weekly_amounts.details: Print view shows Avant taxes: 170.96$, TPS: 8.55$, TVQ: 17.05$ - all weekly amounts (not monthly ~740$)

bug_fix_2_back_button.details: 'Retour au calculateur' button found in print view HTML with back-btn and no-print classes

bug_fix_3_best_lease_frequency_label.details: 'MEILLEUR CHOIX LOCATION' shows 'HEBDO:' label (not MENSUEL) with weekly payment 168.20$/sem

bug_fix_4_analysis_grid_title.details: Analysis grid title shows 'Paiements hebdo' when weekly selected, values are weekly (~176-197$)

main_ui_lease_cards.details: Main UI lease cards show Avant taxes: 170.96$ (weekly amount) when Hebdo frequency selected
